languages.text: Неосторожный шаг одной из рабочих привел к обрушению находящейся прямо под поверхностью планеты полости. Это не только погубило саму неумеху, но и вызвало цепную реакцию обрушений, унесшую жизни всей команды.

One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.
languages.original_text: Неосторожный шаг одной из рабочих привел к обрушению находящейся прямо под поверхностью планеты полости. Это не только погубило саму неумеху, но и вызвало цепную реакцию обрушений, унесшую жизни всей команды.

traits.locale_text: One careless step of a crew member caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, killing not only the klutz, but the whole crew.
One careless step of a crew member caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, killing not only the klutz, but the whole crew.

One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse. It killed not only the incompetent fool, but caused a catastrophic chain reaction, taking the lives of the whole crew.

One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

languages.text: 某位粗心大意的工作人员犯了个错，导致整个洞穴网络坍塌。这位工人引发了灾难性的连锁反应，不仅害得他自己丧了命，还害死了整支探险队的所有人。
languages.original_text: One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

traits.locale_text: 某位粗心大意的工作人员犯了个错，导致整个洞穴网络坍塌。这位工人引发了灾难性的连锁反应，不仅害得他自己丧了命，还害死了整支探险队的所有人。

languages.text: El error descuidado de un tripulante hace que todo el sistema de cavernas colapse, matando no solo al culpable, sino también al resto del equipo en una catastrófica reacción en cadena.
languages.original_text: One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

traits.locale_text: El error descuidado de un tripulante hace que todo el sistema de cavernas colapse, matando no solo al culpable, sino también al resto del equipo en una catastrófica reacción en cadena.

languages.text: 一人のクルーの不注意が原因で、地下に張り巡らされた洞窟網全体が崩壊。そのクルーが死亡しただけでなく、チーム全員の命が奪われる大惨事となった。
languages.original_text: One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

traits.locale_text: 一人のクルーの不注意が原因で、地下に張り巡らされた洞窟網全体が崩壊。そのクルーが死亡しただけでなく、チーム全員の命が奪われる大惨事となった。

languages.text: Durch den fahrlässigen Fehler eines einzigen Crewmitglieds brach das gesamten Höhlensystem zusammen. Dabei kam nicht nur der Unglücksvogel selbst ums Leben, es wurde auch eine katastrophale Kettenreaktion ausgelöst, die das gesamte Team tötete.
languages.original_text: One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

traits.locale_text: Durch den fahrlässigen Fehler eines einzigen Crewmitglieds brach das gesamten Höhlensystem zusammen. Dabei kam nicht nur der Unglücksvogel selbst ums Leben, es wurde auch eine katastrophale Kettenreaktion ausgelöst, die das gesamte Team tötete.

languages.text: Le faux pas accidentel d'un des membres de l'équipage a provoqué l'effondrement de l'ensemble du réseau de cavernes, tuant ainsi non seulement le fautif, mais également toute l'équipe lors de la réaction en chaîne désastreuse qui s'en est suivie.
languages.original_text: One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.

traits.locale_text: Le faux pas accidentel d'un des membres de l'équipage a provoqué l'effondrement de l'ensemble du réseau de cavernes, tuant ainsi non seulement le fautif, mais également toute l'équipe lors de la réaction en chaîne désastreuse qui s'en est suivie.

languages.text: Mürettebattan birinin özensiz bir hatası yüzünden altlarındaki tüm mağara ağı çöktü. Hem hatayı yapan işçi öldü hem de çıkan yıkıcı zincirleme reaksiyonda tüm ekip canından oldu.
languages.original_text: One crew member's careless misstep caused the whole network of caverns beneath to collapse, not only killing the blundering worker, but causing a catastrophic chain reaction that claimed the lives of the whole team.
